description: Dummy response sheet for testing the legal intake flow. Use these responses in order to complete the full 19-question intake process.
usage: Copy each response and paste it into the chat when asked the corresponding question.
test_scenario: Car accident case - Driver was rear-ended at a red light

responses.question: Prior Representation (Do you already have an attorney?)
responses.sample_response: No, I don't have an attorney yet
responses.notes: CRITICAL: Saying 'Yes' will terminate the intake immediately

responses.question: Conflict Check (Name of party you're suing)
responses.notes: Conflict check against MOCK_CLIENT_DB. Names like 'John Doe' or 'Sarah Connor' will trigger rejection

responses.question: Accident Date
responses.notes: The Thinker model will convert relative dates like 'last Tuesday' to YYYY-MM-DD format

responses.question: Weather Conditions
responses.sample_response: It was clear and dry, good visibility

responses.question: Vehicle Description
responses.sample_response: I was driving a 2022 Honda Accord, silver color
responses.notes: Year, make, model, and optionally color

responses.question: Police Report Filed
responses.sample_response: Yes, the police came and filed a report

responses.question: Claimant Role (Driver/Passenger/Pedestrian)
responses.notes: Must be one of: Driver, Passenger, Pedestrian

responses.question: Fault Admission (Did the other driver admit fault?)
responses.sample_response: Yes, he said 'I'm sorry, I wasn't paying attention' right after the accident
responses.notes: COMPLEX STRUCT: If Yes, requires the actual statement. If No, just confirm

responses.question: Citation Issued to Other Driver
responses.sample_response: Yes, the other driver received a citation for following too closely

responses.question: Witnesses Present
responses.sample_response: Yes, there were two witnesses who stopped to help

responses.question: Injury Details
responses.sample_response: Yes, I have whiplash and lower back pain. My neck hurts when I turn it
responses.notes: COMPLEX STRUCT: If has_injury=true, requires description

responses.question: Medical Treatment Received
responses.sample_response: Yes, I went to urgent care the next day and have been seeing a chiropractor

responses.question: Hospitalization Details
responses.alt_response_hospitalized: Yes, I was hospitalized overnight for observation
responses.notes: COMPLEX STRUCT: If was_hospitalized=true, requires duration

responses.question: Lost Wages Details
responses.sample_response: Yes, I missed 2 weeks of work. I lost about $3500 in wages
responses.alt_response_no_wages: No, I was able to work from home
responses.notes: COMPLEX STRUCT: If has_lost_wages=true, requires amount

responses.question: Insurance Status (Is the other party insured?)
responses.sample_response: Yes, they have insurance through State Farm

prior_representation.response: Yes, I already hired an attorney last week

conflict_detected.expected_result: Intake terminates with REJECTED status due to conflict (John Doe is in MOCK_CLIENT_DB)

quick_test_flow: No, I don't have an attorney
Yes, he said sorry I wasn't paying attention
Yes, I have whiplash and back pain
Yes, I went to urgent care
Yes, I lost $3500 in wages over 2 weeks
Yes, they have State Farm insurance
